short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We make Facebook as fancy as you are.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension replaces the text of Facebook's "Like" feature with "I Fancy This". 

All text references to the "Like" feature are replaced with a classy-ass alternative but Images and Buttons that refer to "Like" are left unchanged.

**UPDATE** Now featuring "Oof": when you are done fancying something.
